<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Home">1cc9b9a493e4021026ba7e8efaba10b7</macroponent><name>Show Hide Collapse Container</name><preset/><required_translations>[
    
]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
* @param {params} params
* @param {api} params.api
* @param {any} params.event
* @param {any} params.imports
* @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
*/
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
if(api.state.showCon == false)
api.setState('showCon', true);
else
api.setState('showCon', false);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-02-20 23:07:59</sys_created_on><sys_id>98c9b9a493e4021026ba7e8efaba10bb</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Show Hide Collapse Container</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Automated Asset Management System" source="x_757927_automat_0">4b28a3fb9354021026ba7e8efaba1069</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Automated Asset Management System">4b28a3fb9354021026ba7e8efaba1069</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_98c9b9a493e4021026ba7e8efaba10bb</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-02-20 23:07:59</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
